response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact on your operations, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000 for you. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
